name: Skin Cancer CNN Classifier
desc: A convolutional neural network designed to differentiate between benign and malignant skin lesions. Trained on a set of 10,000 images. Built using PyTorch and analyzed using Matplotlib. Boasts better than a 90% testing accuracy after 10 epochs of training.

name: NCDIT Procurement Tracker
desc: A full-stack web application built in collaboration with the North Carolina Department of IT. Designed to facilitate the complex IT procurement process by providing educational content, contact information, and a visual (similar to that of a pizza tracker) that displays an Agency's current step along the process. Built using Ruby on Rails, Rest API endpoints, a MySQL database, and containerized using Docker

name: Online Poker
desc: The classic game of Texas Hold-Em built as a full-stack web app. Utilizes a Websocket for live game-state communication. A PostgreSQL database is used for user credential details and game history. Front-end componets are built in React, and the backend uses a Node + Express server. (Ongoing)

name: To be determined...
desc: Stock visualizer? Not sure what to put here. Open to ideas
